price: ইহঁতে উটৰ পিনে দৃষ্টিপাত নকৰে নেকি, কেনেকৈ তাক সৃষ্টি কৰা হৈছে?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
